basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Jere Roberson Scholarship in Social Justice

description: The goal of this scholarship is to honor the legacy and social justice work of Dr. Jere Roberson and to empower historically underrepresented student communities to persist in their educational goals and become role models. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 2.8 overall GPA Undergraduate or graduate student Any major in the Department of History and Geography Preference given to a student from a community historically underrepresented with financial need Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded Provide a personal statement of 1.5 - 2 page (max) explaining background and life goals including career goals Applicant will provide a statement identifying their social justice activities over the last 5 years Reference letters from at least two of the applicant's professors are required
